subject: The Skinny: Tuesday April 17, 2007
body:

  The Early Show | CBS Evening News | 48 Hours | 60 Minutes | The Saturday Early Show | CBS Sunday Morning | Face The Nation 





The Wired Generation Copes With Tragedy 
As part of their extensive coverage of the shooting 
      rampage at Virginia Tech, the morning papers look at how tech-savvy students used the Internet, cell 
      phone cameras and text messaging to share information about the unfolding 
      tragedy on their campus.
Joel Roberts has the highlights of the day's 
      headlines.  More...
 
      
Joel Robertstheskinny@cbs.com
